title: Table Comparison Tool
description: Compare table entries based on a unique entry identifier. Files uploaded in CSV format and are compared using the pandas library.

title: Weather App
description: A vue app displaying weather data retrieved from an express backend that uses the openweathermap API. Sets a random unsplash image of the requested location as the background image.

title: Artist Portfolio
description: Minmalistic artist portfolio. Needs some revision of mobile layout.

title: This Dev Portfolio
description: A simple vue app with a custom design. Uses a workflow to automatically deploy a build on pushing to master.
